definition: to disappear like a stone dropped into the sea/to vanish forever without trace

rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
to cast/to send/to throw oneself (into the river etc)/to seek refuge/to place oneself into the hands of
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

lit. to throw a stone and see it sink without trace in the sea (idiom)/fig. to elicit no response
a pool of stagnant water/stagnant or listless condition
